section1.title: Green Fungible
section1.subtitle: Energy - GFE
section1.description: GFE is a trailblazing initiative designed to tokenize green energy. Providing a unique investment opportunity that bridges the gap between environmental impact and economic incentive, while bringing the first global perspective to electrical costs.

section2.title: Functionalities
section2.description: This twofold implication of GFE tokens means that not only do they serve as tradable assets with income, but they are also reflective of sustainable practices and have tangible, real-world utility.
section2.card1description: Register staking contract and get reward from our infrastructure.
section2.card2description: Each unit completely offsets grid inefficiencies with guilt-free energy.
section2.card3description: Buy and sell our token and participate in server hosting income.

section3.card1description: Our journey began with the design and construction of a sustainably-run server hosting environment prototype.
section3.card2description: NFT holders have the ownership of these units and earn a daily income.

section4.title: Building a Better Future
section4.description: By increasing our capacity, we not only enhance the value of GFE tokens but also contribute to a larger societal shift towards renewable energy usage. Our planet benefits every time a power-intensive industry is moved to renewable in a way that carbon offsets can't provide. Industries we are examining for KW fungibility.
section4.description2: We are going to participate in energy-intensive industries and market our effluent heat energy.

section5.title: GET TO KNOW
section5.subtitle: GREEN FUNGIBLE ENERGY - GFE
section5.answer1: GFE tokens are the digital representation of electrical energy, with each token signifying the right to direct the use of 1kWh of green energy that will be generated and consumed by our infrastructure. This twofold implication of GFE tokens means that not only do they serve as tradable assets with income, but they are also reflective of sustainable practices and have tangible, real-world utility.
section5.answer2: Bitcoin mining is the process by which new bitcoins are created and transactions are added to the blockchain, a decentralized ledger of all transactions in the Bitcoin network. It involves solving complex mathematical problems that validate and secure transactions on the network.
section5.answer3: Bitcoin mining is the process by which new bitcoins are created and transactions are added to the blockchain, a decentralized ledger of all transactions in the Bitcoin network. It involves solving complex mathematical problems that validate and secure transactions on the network.
section5.question4: How does Bitcoin mining work in a company?
section5.answer4: Bitcoin mining is the process by which new bitcoins are created and transactions are added to the blockchain, a decentralized ledger of all transactions in the Bitcoin network. It involves solving complex mathematical problems that validate and secure transactions on the network.

section1.title: Join our Community
section1.description: By joining the GFE project, investors and environmental advocates alike can contribute to the development of a sustainable energy ecosystem while receiving the economic benefits afforded by blockchain technology and server hosting with an ecologically sound and ethically backed global commodity price for extraction-free power.

section2.title: Not a member of our exclusive newsletter?
section2.description: Gain instant access to a series of valuable insights from the market, and empower yourself with knowledge that can help you seize control of your global energy market.

goalSection.title: Our Goal
goalSection.description: GFE tokens are the digital representation of electrical energy, with each token signifying the right to use a kW of green energy that will be generated by our infrastructure. This twofold implication of GFE tokens means that not only do they serve as tradable assets reflective of sustainable practices, but they also have tangible, real-world utility.

GFE_section.para1: The foundation's vision began with a simple question: why does everyone want solar; and no buys it? Energy democracy is the core answer. It can be measured in market friction. A typical suburb homeowner installation offsets the home's consumption of power and uses the grid as storage. The problems are many in this scenario; with monopoly and monopsony relationships to the grid, it is a questionable trading partner. The utility and its local choice in commodity for electricity generation are global effects on local price. This may or may not be a benefit in local fiat.
GFE_section.para2: This global commons perspective framed our efforts, and scaling our DAPPr unit to a productive electricital capacity solved several problems. We simply create more power in stressed locations.
GFE_section.para3: Our solar farm capacity allows us to generate electricity for many things. We sell power locally, to EV‚Äôs, and as partners in grid stability packages; in addition we host servers, and make bio diesel and hydrogen. You don‚Äôt need the grid for electricity, the grid needs you to help reduce the extractive commodities it uses for power. Break free of your convenience leash and make the world better.
GFE_section.para4: In a world where people are hungry and thirsty, where the utility needs to purchase its extraction energy commodity in colonial weighted fiat, we offer to help. We make water, power, cooking energy, bathrooms, safety and security available to a community on a personal level. We meter our distribution of resources, and provide them free of charge.
GFE_section.para5: Our prototype unit will work to normalize utility scale electrical capacity without grid necessity. The unit produces global currency backed local production to mostly developing countries. We seek to improve the world we hold in stewardship for our progeny.

energy_section.title: Views on energy
energy_section.para1: Electricity is a production commodity due to its structure. Current technology to store it is not ready to scale to meet our grid based distribution technology. This state of affairs makes sales linked to consumption in most markets: nearly all electricity is sold and consumed at the same time.
energy_section.para2: Small scale storage, for a productive asset consuming a resource, has different motivation than a productive asset which has an operating expense from its grid energy appetite. We care for the electricity we make in a different manner than the financial impact felt from a monthly bill. The production and consumption of energy by direction allows the best of all situations.
energy_section.para3: The NFT owner is responsible for clean solar panels while fixing carbon with plants on site. They maximize KW, maintain their owned equipment, and grow life into a site. The Guild seeks most efficacious use of global electricity, and the token holders are supporting the process and profiting from Guild producion based on global common electricity. There is power in energy democracy.
energy_section.para4: The world's diet for energy is in part due to the convenience of a grid. Most developing worlds do not have easy access to electricity to facilitate using a clothes dryer. Often they dry their clothes outside.
energy_section.para5: Being able to run a dryer 24/7/365 is part of the promise of a grid in the US, but a reluctant addition to a home owner's solar system. Providing for a grid requires capacity for everything. In the US this results in many plants running at low (inefficient) power levels to stand by for demand loads. These plants are often coal fired, and even more inefficient (but less polluting) by running at standby.
energy_section.para6: The more small loads we can partition and remove from their grid leashed defaults in design, the more our world transitions to renewable power
energy_section.para7: Small scale storage, for a productive asset consuming a resource, has different motivation than a productive asset which has an operating expense from its grid energy appetite. We care for the electricity we make in a different manner than the financial impact felt from a monthly bill. The production and consumption of energy by direction allows the best of all situations.
energy_section.para8: The NFT owner is responsible for clean solar panels while fixing carbon with plants on site. They maximize KW, maintain their owned equipment, and grow life into a site. The Guild seeks most efficacious use of global electricity, and the token holders are supporting the process and profiting from Guild producion based on global common electricity. There is power in energy democracy.
energy_section.point1: Small scale renewable hydrocarbon brewing is needed in many places, this is due to the
energy_section.point2: intrinsic costs of delivery of extractive energy. Many small efforts are needed to change things.
energy_section.point3: Our transition energy needs rely heavily on hydrogen in many playbooks. That infrastructure can be built in what ever manner our global commons chooses.

market_section.title: Electricity Market Landscape
market_section.para1: The global energy market is estimated to be worth: $2trillion. However, it is largely centralized by a few corporations. These corporations often call themselves energy companies; but in our lifetime have migrated into profitable areas of the energy industry. They are drilling companies supplying an unfettered demand from grids. Energy is not oil, Oil is a profitable sector of the energy market. Our world needs to look beyond profit oriented corporate mandates. A corporation will not come naturally to a conversation about unpriced externalities in their process. Those conversations will only cost them money, and corporations are mandated by law to seek profit. They want to do things the same way.
market_section.para2: The intensely local monopoly market for electricity is built for stability and convenience; and it consumes a globally normalized energy source, traded and transported with a fiat markup. Monopolies trade amongst themselves, at market rates, for concurrent delivery. The market price in the UK is near to 0.45 usd per kw and China‚Äôs power market is around 0.04 per kw. The power in the UK is not aging coal fired power, and China power is not deliverable to the UK. There is no global commodity market for electricity, until now.
market_section.point1: Consumption of power is convenient at the location a business operates.
market_section.point2: Assembly plants often use steel produced from Chinese power for assembly in part due to the intensive energy requirements for steel.
market_section.point3: Office spaces use servers powered in Iceland.

power_section.title: Unpriced Externalities in Power Production
power_section.description: Externalities are costs that are not present in the market price. There are externalities in production, transportation, consumption and disposal. Global warming and colonialism are in part attributable to these classifications of economic forces.

faq_section.para1: The local utility generates XX mw of power a year. It is used for industry, residential, and desalination loads for water. The power is in the form of oil. There is no ship sized storage docking or storage, so 1-3 small tankers are kept near shore to service the transactions and the unloading and storage of large tankers that park off shore. The guild sees current efforts to fund Dredging of the sea of Cortez as a local energy stress demanding a fiat reduction in market frictions for the current consumption rate of oil. It takes 2.2L of (diesel equivalency in energy) to deliver 1 L. The Guild does not support consumption based ROI calculations for dredging or petroleum infrastructure. They provide increased consumption capacity measured in fiat efficiency. Dredging the sea of Cortez‚Ä¶ Priceless.
faq_section.para2: Using the rural area adjacent to La Paz for DAPPr units can provide a grid stability package in 5-7 years. Thes decentralized power producing assets can be coordinated to feed district and grid stability power, after infrastructure development. This feeding of the grid from various small producers as one entity can put a huge dent in the oil consumption of the community. It will reduce global warming and bring a western economy income to a local means of of global production, a sunlight farmer.

nft.title: Reshape The Future Of
nft.subtitle: clean energy with DAPPr NFT
nft.description: Our Journey began with the design and construction of a sustainably-run server hosting environment prototype. NFT holders have the ownership of these units and earn a daily income.

about_section.title: About DAPPr NFT
about_section.para1: DAPPr unit - This is a solar/wind energy resource, an island of stability in an already stressed grid ecosystem so common in sunbelt countries. This unit will provide a 350kw electrical bus, and the property host provides the energy input. Utilizing cutting-edge technology, it delivers the best performance with servers metered directly, and a novel and efficient cooling system that is evaporation free and mostly passive.
about_section.para2: The NFT our collective produces is a DAPPr unit, but the collective extends membership to any renewable producer. By investing in a DAPPr unit, you provide the land it sits upon, the solar panels, and maintain the energy collection systems on your site. Income is earned daily from meter readings on the DAPPr. We will manage the systems maintenance and operations on our side with fractional income. With DAPPr NFT, you can enjoy all of the benefits of our unit and contribute to the sustainable world. Its similar to owning a small farm, your crop is sunlight.
about_section.para3: We are the first to merge blockchain and real assets - It will be a unique chance for individuals. You can become a DAO member in our group and contribute positively to a renewable future and enjoy tangible benefits from making the world better.

hosting_section.title: Blockchain and server hosting
hosting_section.para1: The world cost of electricity is determined by local monopolies. We have no global market to draw a value measurement for decentralized local power, each monopoly location is different. Market prices are based on many factors, in our case we need a global process that consumes power around the world to measure against. This energy use needs to provide a product that is fungible globally. We see the energy and hash power related to blockchain earnings as an ideal situation for analysis, it consumes more than 1% of the world's energy.
hosting_section.para2: This process of turning kw into hash power, and pooling for reward and conversion to FIAT currency, occurs in London and China. The equipment is very similar and the local energy of choice is the only notable variable. Often mining environments (servers, electrical infrastructure, cooling equipment and housing) are decommissioned along with the aged processing equipment. We view this as wasteful.
hosting_section.para3: The environment and equipment requirements are so similar it's hard to tell the difference between server hosting and mining, the whole industry is in the business of consuming kw for hosting. We charge for our services in this way; we see electricity as an internal component of the production step of server hosting, and we build 50 year environments for it. The collective doesn't discriminate in our server hosting; we sell our power to all. We provide ethically sourced power one KW at a time to global commons consumers.

faq_section.description: Belows are the FAQs regarding our NFT‚Äôs with answers
faq_section.answer1_1: GFE tokens are the digital representation of electrical energy, with each token signifying the right to direct the use of 1kWh of green energy that will be generated and consumed by our infrastructure. This twofold implication of GFE tokens means that not only do they serve as tradable assets with income, but they are also reflective of sustainable practices and have tangible, real-world utility.
faq_section.answer1_2: They trade in Global Commons energy. Our world is filled with poverty and energy stress. We see a way to create more energy while investing in the community. Making hydrogen requires green hydrocarbons consumed for electricity. This is working with what we have to reduce stresses we see.
faq_section.answer1_3: Our energy includes products we create like hydrogen and green hydrocarbons, electricity from solar and wind, heat energy, and carbon fixing energy with our processing of bio mass. Other forms of energy which approach their extraction (like uranium), equipment lifecycle, and its place in a global ecosystem they may be GC energy.
faq_section.answer1_4: Some things are GC by existing like tidal, OTEC and others. They must all be efficacious in their use to be GC.
faq_section.question2: What exactly will I get by purchasing an NFT from your marketplace?
faq_section.answer2_1: Bitcoin mining is the process by which new bitcoins are created and transactions are added to the blockchain, a decentralized ledger of all transactions in the Bitcoin network. It involves solving complex mathematical problems that validate and secure transactions on the network.
faq_section.answer2_2: We see the value of measuring accurately by contributing GFE and measuring. As we grow GC sourced energy we will improve our metrics to measure extraction energy demands from mining energy.
faq_section.answer3_1: We have staking options in our guild transformation services. These are available locally in an NFT, and as a guild offering globally. When we have traditional blockchain mining they will be available at our bulk rate. This is an example of staking in one form of server hosting, we will operate a GFE pool at a point where it is efficacious.
faq_section.answer3_2: A local DAPPr NFT has guild transformation services like biodiesel and hydrogen, land fill and mine tailing remediation, and injection molding. Additionally we provide AI hosting for training processing; both on bulk guild owned equipment, and with customer provided platforms we host.
faq_section.answer3_3: Lastly we as a guild sponsor efforts, both new DAPPr units, and expansion into OTEC platforms for ocean remediation platforms. These and other energy and human rights projects are able to fund as a globe. We look forward to building power capacity for a GC MRI installed in Africa.
faq_section.answer4_1: Our 20‚Äô DAPPr 1 is easy to partially assemble, and finish in local developed cities. The choice in Guild development in each city is to grow and use local resources and adjust our supplied products to a region to fit local assembly and fabrication capacity.
faq_section.answer4_2: Our DAPPr customer has a 1-2 year journey of development, site, commissioning. This is a global asset we are building into the earth. A 50 year environment tales time. They own the site power collection equipment like wind and solar. We provide the rest of the equipment, and operate the systems.
faq_section.answer4_3: Each asset is owned by 4 parties, The land owner, the guild, the eco system, and the member DAO for the region. The asset is valued by its electrical bus design; 350kw in a 20‚Äô container.

bitcoin_mining01.question: What is Bitcoin mining?
bitcoin_mining01.answer: Bitcoin mining is the process by which new bitcoins are created and transactions are added to the blockchain, a decentralized ledger of all transactions in the Bitcoin network. It involves solving complex mathematical problems that validate and secure transactions on the network.

privacy.introduction_content: Welcome to GFE Foundation's Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy gives you an understanding of how GFE Foundation (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù), takes care of your personal information when you visit www.gfe.foundation (our ‚ÄúWebsite‚Äù), and provide any data to us. Please take the time to read this Privacy Policy carefully. By using our Website, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
privacy.information_collection_and_use_content: We collect different types of information, including personal identification data like your name, email address, phone number, and others that you give to us voluntarily, to understand your needs better and provide you with an improved interface in our website. We also gather statistical visitor details (such as your IP address), and usage data which helps us improve our system performance and user experience.
privacy.how_we_use_your_information_content: We use the gathered information for several reasons including, but not limited to, customer service, data analysis, operation, maintenance of our website, and fulfilling our legal obligations. Your data is also utilized for promotional purposes only if you consent to it. You have the right to withdraw such consent at any point in time.
privacy.disclosure_of_your_information_content: GFE Foundation will never trade, rent or sell your personal information to any third parties. However, we may share your personal data with third-party suppliers or contractors that assist in our operation and maintain confidentiality in processing your orders.
privacy.security_of_your_information_content: We put in place suitable physical and electronic procedures to safeguard and secure the personal information we collect online against unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy.cookies_content: Our site uses 'cookies' - small files placed on your device - to analyze web traffic semi-anonymously, which helps us enhance your interaction with our website.
privacy.links_to_other_sites_content: Our website may contain links to other websites for your convenience. Please note that when you click on these links, you are moving to another website that may have different privacy policies.
privacy.changes_to_this_privacy_policy_content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. The most current version of the Privacy Policy will supersede all previous versions. Your continued use of the services after any changes or revisions to this Privacy Policy shall indicate your agreement with the terms of such revised Privacy Policy.
privacy.contact_us_content: Should you have any questions regarding this policy or our processing of your personal data, you can end us an email at contact@gfe.foundation. This privacy policy applies solely to information gathered through the website and not to information collected offline. Your use of this website, and any dispute arising from it, is subject to this Privacy Policy as well as the website's Terms and Conditions and all of its dispute resolution provisions including arbitration, limitation on damages and choice of law.
